A mobile suitcase charging station: A portable device that can charge multiple electronic devices on the go. This can be especially useful for travelers who need to keep their devices charged while on the move.

A smart suitcase: A suitcase that is equipped with technology such as GPS tracking, a built-in scale, and a charging dock for electronic devices. This can help travelers keep track of their luggage, weigh their items, and stay connected while on the go.

A modular suitcase: A suitcase that can be easily customized and reconfigured to fit the needs of the traveler. This can include additional compartments, detachable pockets, and other features that can be added or removed as needed.

A self-driving suitcase: A suitcase that is equipped with autonomous driving technology, allowing it to navigate through airports and other crowded areas on its own. This can help travelers save time and reduce the stress of navigating through busy airports.

A smart suitcase with a built-in AI assistant: A suitcase that is equipped with an AI assistant that can help travelers plan their trip, keep track of their itinerary, and provide personalized recommendations based on their preferences and interests. This can help travelers make the most of their trip and ensure that they have a seamless and stress-free experience.
